casebody.data:
Bierl, Appellee, v. BGZ Associates II, L.L.C., Appellant.

[Cite as Bierl v. BGZ Assocs. II, L.L.C., 138 Ohio St.3d 357, 2014-Ohio-1172.]

(No. 2013-0585 Submitted March 12, 2014 Decided March 27, 2014.) Patrick T. Murphy, for appellee. Gallagher, Gams, Pryor, Tallan, & Littrell, L.L.P., and Timothy J. Ryan, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Mann v. Northgate Investors, L.L.C., 138 Ohio St.3d 175, 2014-Ohio-455, 5 N.E.3d 594.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Kennedy, French, and O’Neill, JJ., concur.
